name: G-Max One Blow
effect: The Dark-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Darkness while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. Same properties as Feint, hitting even through an opposing Max Guard.
description: The user charges a nasty punch, feinting the strike and luring any guards before the actual, true attack reveals itself, going around all cover to hit its true target.
